title: Erdős Problem #678
description: Let ... be the least common multiple of .... Are there infinitely many ... and ... with ... such that\[M(n,k)>M(m,k+1)?\]

overview.problemStatement: Let $M(n,k)=[n+1,\ldots,n+k]$ be the least common multiple of $\{n+1,\ldots,n+k\}$. Are there infinitely many $m,n$ and $k\geq 3$ with $m\geq n+k$ such that\[M(n,k)>M(m,k+1)?\]
